main.name: Ahmed Hamodi
main.description: I am a web development engineer and I use react and python to develop pages. This project is a resume template that can be used as the project home page or resume page
main.bio: I am a young aspiring Software Engineer, with experience in full-stack development, machine learning, scripting, and automation. I am motivated by my passion for learning new technologies and perfecting my craft. I will never shy away from a challenge and I will always approach tasks with a positive attitude and a willingness to colloborate, explain, and take criticism to continue to improve.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.description: Elected as Academic Class Rep for every term. Cumulative GPA of 84%. Play in intramural sports including soccer, basketball & volleyball.
98% grade 12 average. Cumulative average of 96%. Leader of Electric Car Club, Fed Prov, and the peer tutoring group.
